DISTRIBUTION: Egypt , Algeria , Morocco , Azores, Europe, Russia , Caucasus, Turkey , Syria , Afghanistan , Uzbekistan , Nepal , Mongolia , China , “Karakorum region”. Note: According to Schillhammer (personal communication) the records for the Oriental region cited above refer to
P . variipennis
and
P . bassus
.
